mapper.sql: id, main_id, pre_payment_id, type, money, remaining_amount, ref_no, create_time, remark, position, update_time, bill_type, biz_type, bill_no, rebate_amount, frozen_amount
mapper.select: SELECT main_id,create_time FROM wholesale_customer_remaining_dtl WHERE POSITION IS NULL GROUP BY create_time,main_id HAVING COUNT(create_time) > 1;
SELECT COUNT(1) as s FROM wholesale_customer_remaining_dtl WHERE 1=1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wholesale_customer_remaining_dtl (main_id, pre_payment_id, type, money, remaining_amount, ref_no, create_time, remark, position, update_time, bill_type, biz_type, bill_no, rebate_amount, frozen_amount) VALUES ( #{mainId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{prePaymentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{remainingAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{refNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{billType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{bizType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{billNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{rebateAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{frozenAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

UPDATE wholesale_customer_remaining_dtl
main_id = #{mainId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pre_payment_id = #{prePaymentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT},
money = #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
remaining_amount = #{remainingAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ref_no = #{refNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
position = #{position,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
bill_type = #{billType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
biz_type = #{bizType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
bill_no = #{billNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
rebate_amount = #{rebateAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
frozen_amount = #{frozenAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
